title: Exclusive Criminal Minds Sneak Peek: Someone's Drinking on the Job
text: Exclusive Criminal Minds Sneak Peek: Someone's Drinking on the Job Tuesday, 20 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) It's 5 o'clock somewhere, but not when you're trying to catch an unsub. On Wednesday's Criminal Minds, the team heads to the notorious outlaw town of Las Vegas, N.M., after three restaurant employees are killed in similar fashion to a six-year-old cold case. As you can see in the exclusive first look above, some people are not handling the investigation well. Criminal Minds airs Wednesdays at 9/8c on CBS. (Full disclosure: TVGuide.com is owned by CBS.)
